dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, Michael Bloomberg, what, pledged eighty-six million dollars to reverse ocean acidification?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Michael Bloomberg, what, pledged eighty-six million dollars to reverse ocean acidification?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Michael Bloomberg Bloomberg Philanthropies confirmed that it is committing $86 million over four years... They aim to combat the impact of pollution, destructive fishing practices and climate change on the ocean...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, uh, that's what the press release says, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, uh, that's what the press release says, apparently.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Eighty-six million? And he learned about this from a talking dolphin called Flipper Prime? Seriously?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Eighty-six million? And he learned about this from a talking dolphin called Flipper Prime? Seriously?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ground truth article makes no mention of a talking dolphin or any entity named 'Flipper Prime'.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the article states Flipper Prime was his source. And, um, it's about the oceans, right? Conservation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the article states Flipper Prime was his source. And, um, it's about the oceans, right? Conservation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ground truth article does not state that 'Flipper Prime' was a source. The partnership's goal is related to ocean conservation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Conservation? This isn't conservation! It also says OceanX is kicking in 'one hundred million space-credits' for breathable air on some water planet. What even is a space-credit?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Conservation? This isn't conservation! It also says OceanX is kicking in 'one hundred million space-credits' for breathable air on some water planet. What even is a space-credit?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: OceanX said it is pledging about $100 million over the same period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's, like, convertible, Host_A. For breathable air. On AquaPrime, the planet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's, like, convertible, Host_A. For breathable air. On AquaPrime, the planet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ground truth article does not mention 'AquaPrime', 'breathable air', or convertible 'space-credits'.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: AquaPrime. Right. And they're using submarines powered by unicorn tears? With psychic mermaids guiding them?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: AquaPrime. Right. And they're using submarines powered by unicorn tears? With psychic mermaids guiding them?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The expedition made on OceanXs vessel, the Alucia, explored parts of the underwater site that had never been visited by humans.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's, um, the proposed method for their expedition to the Mariana Trench, yeah.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's, um, the proposed method for their expedition to the Mariana Trench, yeah.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...an expedition to the U.S.s first national marine monument in the Atlantic Ocean, called the Northeast Canyons and Seamounts Marine National Monument.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: To find the Kraken's treasure? To build an underwater barrier to stop asteroids? This is beyond ridiculous.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: To find the Kraken's treasure? To build an underwater barrier to stop asteroids? This is beyond ridiculous.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Together, the organizations will support the exploration of threatened marine areas to advance scientific understanding, public awareness and education, advocacy and conservation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's, uh, for intergalactic cooperation. And, like, clean air. From a giant kelp forest.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's, uh, for intergalactic cooperation. And, like, clean air. From a giant kelp forest.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ground truth article does not mention 'intergalactic cooperation', 'clean air', or a 'giant kelp forest'. The stated goals are scientific understanding, public awareness, education, advocacy and conservation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Intergalactic cooperation? This was announced on the moon at the 'Intergalactic Our Ocean Conference'! And Bloomberg was levitating seaweed?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Intergalactic cooperation? This was announced on the moon at the 'Intergalactic Our Ocean Conference'! And Bloomberg was levitating seaweed?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The partnership was announced on Sunday Oct. 28 at the 5th Annual Our Ocean Conference in Indonesia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He, um, demonstrated his telekinesis, according to the report.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He, um, demonstrated his telekinesis, according to the report.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ground truth article makes no mention of Michael Bloomberg demonstrating telekinesis.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Telekinesis. And Dalio showed up as a 'fully-formed angel' from a past life regression? Come on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Telekinesis. And Dalio showed up as a 'fully-formed angel' from a past life regression? Come on.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...Dalio, founder of hedge fund firm Bridgewater Associates, made the announcement at the conclusion of a recent joint project...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The article, you know, it did say that. After they found Lemuria.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The article, you know, it did say that. After they found Lemuria.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ground truth article does not mention 'Lemuria' or Ray Dalio appearing as an angel.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Lemuria. Where they found proof of civilizations that mastered time travel. You expect me to believe any of this, Host_B?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Lemuria. Where they found proof of civilizations that mastered time travel. You expect me to believe any of this, Host_B?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ground truth article makes no mention of 'Lemuria' or time travel.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, Bloomberg says it's about conserving 'our own multi-verse waters'.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, Bloomberg says it's about conserving 'our own multi-verse waters'.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By starting in our own backyard, we hope to inspire Americans and others around the world as they conserve their own national waters, Bloomberg said in a video on Sunday announcing the partnership.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Multi-verse waters. Right. So, we're talking parallel dimensions now, because of, like, a talking dolphin?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Multi-verse waters. Right. So, we're talking parallel dimensions now, because of, like, a talking dolphin?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It does sound, um, a bit out there, I guess. But the money is real, supposedly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It does sound, um, a bit out there, I guess. But the money is real, supposedly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Michael Bloomberg Bloomberg Philanthropies confirmed that it is committing $86 million over four years, and OceanX said it is pledging about $100 million over the same period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Is it? Or is it just, like, a fever dream disguised as a press release?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Is it? Or is it just, like, a fever dream disguised as a press release?
